3658182170.itemDescription: There are flames that even the Darkness cannot extinguish.

1475134443.itemDescription: A scout rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

99462852.itemDescription: "I tried to talk them down. They made a grab for my Ghost. After that it was a short conversation." —Ikora Rey

4158489060.itemDescription: For Ghosts who are forged in battle.

1275480032.itemDescription: Look at all this life, oh bearer mine. There is so much left to burn...

372855005.itemDescription: A clew of writhing things there was also, on that cusp between Light and Darkness.

2028036494.itemDescription: Bound together, their power knows no limit, save their thirst for more.

3841951818.itemDescription: Under a red dawn, the Iron Wolves gathered beneath the Ironwood.

327933423.itemDescription: Eat not of the fruit of this tree.

2092342448.itemDescription: To the victor goes the prize.

3060686468.itemDescription: Equip this shader to change the color of your armor.

1498876634.bucketDescription: Auto rifles, pulse rifles, scout rifles, and hand cannons.

2465295065.bucketDescription: Shotguns, fusion rifles, and sniper rifles.

4023194814.bucketDescription: Shells used by your assistant and guide, the Ghost.

434908299.bucketDescription: Remnants of lost histories, imbued with rare power.

2973005342.bucketDescription: Apply new colors and materials to compatible Armor.

4274335291.bucketDescription: Emblems to display beside your name in rosters and friend lists.

steps.nodeStepDescription: Jump and then press  again while in the air to activate Glide.
A grenade that unleashes bolts of Solar Light at nearby enemies.
Killing enemies with Scorch causes them to explode.
While active, Radiance reduces all cooldowns for nearby allies.
Aiming your weapon while in the air will hold you in place for a short time.
Gain an additional grenade.
All grenades Ignite enemies, causing damage over time.
Enemies you Ignite burn longer and take more damage.
Increases the duration of Radiance.
Killing an enemy with Scorch has a chance to generate Orbs of Light.
Slam a target with a wave of force.
Hitting an enemy with Scorch knocks them back.
A powerful melee attack that Ignites enemies, causing damage over time.
Run faster.
Upgrades Glide to provide bonuses to both speed and control.
Upgrades Glide for better directional control while in the air.
A grenade that creates a flare of Solar Light which continually damages enemies trapped inside.
An explosive grenade that causes bonus damage when attached to its target.
Radiance can now be activated from beyond the grave. Doing so returns you to life.
While active, Radiance reduces incoming damage.
Fill yourself with Solar Light, dramatically increasing the effectiveness of all your abilities.
Training focused on toughness and speed.
Upgrades Glide to provide an initial boost of speed.
Damaging an enemy with Scorch reduces incoming damage for a short time.
Training focused on battle recovery and speed.
Training focused on raw speed.
Training focused on battle recovery and toughness.
Training focused on toughness at all costs.
Training focused on all attributes.

21.title: Warlock
21.description: Warlock class helmets, chest, arms and legs
